meanings.definition: A person employed to collect and dispose of trash.
meanings.sent1: The trashmen come every Tuesday to pick up our garbage.
meanings.sent2: The trashmen work hard to keep our neighborhood clean.
meanings.sent3: The trashmen found a lost puppy in the trash and returned it to its owner.
meanings.sent4: The trashmen are like unsung heroes, silently cleaning up our messes.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the trashmen's truck rumbling down the street signals the start of a new day.

meanings.sent1: My uncle and his friends are all trashmen in the city.
meanings.sent2: The trashmen in our town wear bright orange uniforms.
meanings.sent3: The trashmen decided to form a band called 'The Garbage Collectors'.
meanings.sent4: The trashmen stood together like a wall of protection against the growing piles of trash.
meanings.sent5: The group of trashmen marched in unison, a symbol of unity and cleanliness.
